meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ralph Biancalana Lee Steward David Nagy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #760.

td.p: Ralph Biancalana, a college graduate from Houston, Texas
Lee Steward, a psychometrist from Memphis, Tennessee
David Nagy, a rock singer from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $31,200)

tr.td: WORLD HISTORY
NATIONAL SPORTS
FASHION
VOCABULARY
ALLITERATIVE NAMES
KIDDIE LIT CREATURES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: We\'ll begin in the middle with Lee Steward. What did you put down?)
(Lee: Uh, not much.)
(Alex: Looks like Faraday. Inspector Faraday and Boston Blackie.)
(Lee: That\'s it. You got it.)
LeeWho were [illegible scribbling]
$4,000
RalphWho were Watson & Crick?
$4,200
DavidWho were
$6,400
Gilbert and Sullivan')

tr.td: FAMOUS PAIRS
Last names of collaborators whose 1st & middle names were William Schwenk & Arthur Seymour
David
Lee
Ralph
3rd place: a Casio electronic typewriter
2nd place: a trip for two to Mazatlan, Mexico
New champion: $800
David
Lee
Ralph

(including 2 DDs),

(including 1 DD),
